body:
The `cmd/pack`, `net/http/cgi`, `os/exec` and `runtime/pprof` failures
disappeared when I disabled multiprocessing.

The `runtime` failure is still remaining (only in GCE and only
when run through all.rc). I'm able reproduce it more easily in
GCE now, so I will be able to investigate.

I'll let you know when I would have figured out this issue.
